metadata.title: Bottie - Google Business AI Replies & Insights
metadata.description: Automatically generate AI-powered responses to Google Business reviews and unlock actionable insights from customer feedback. Save time while improving your online reputation and understanding customer sentiment.
metadata.keywords: AI review responses, Google Business Profile, review management, automated replies, customer engagement, business reputation, review automation

hero.title: Professional Responses to Reviews
hero.description: Save valuable time and respond to every review in a personal and professional manner with the power of artificial intelligence. Maintain your brand voice and improve business reputation.

card1.name: Sarah M.
card1.text: Great service! The team was incredibly helpful and professional.
card1.response: Thank you so much, Sarah! We truly appreciate your kind words and are thrilled to hear about your experience.

card2.name: David K.
card2.text: Amazing food and atmosphere. Will definitely come back!
card2.response: Thank you, David! We're so glad you enjoyed it.

card3.name: Rachel L.
card3.text: Best experience I've had. Highly recommend to everyone!

0.name: Sarah Cohen
0.quote: This tool has completely changed how we handle reviews. It saves us hours every week and the responses are professional and personal.

1.name: David Levi
1.quote: I was skeptical at first, but the AI understands our tone perfectly. Highly recommended for any business owner.

2.name: Michael Chen
2.quote: Simple to set up and works like magic. The automatic responses for 5-star reviews are a game changer.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about the system

0.question: How does the system create review responses?
0.answer: The system uses Google's Gemini AI technology to create personalized responses. It takes into account your business description, chosen tone of voice, star rating, and specific instructions you've set for each review type.

1.question: Can I edit responses before publishing?
1.answer: Absolutely! You can configure the system in three modes: manual approval (review every response), full auto-publish, or hybrid mode where you decide based on star rating. For example, 4-5 star reviews auto-publish while lower ratings require manual approval.

2.question: Does the system support Hebrew?
2.answer: Yes! The system fully supports both Hebrew and English. You can set the default response language, or choose 'auto-match' mode where the system detects the review language and responds in the same language.

3.question: How long does it take to get an automated response?
3.answer: The system receives real-time notifications for new reviews via Google Pub/Sub. Typically, a response is generated within 1-2 minutes of the review being published. In auto-publish mode, the response is published immediately after.

4.question: Can I set different responses for different ratings?
4.answer: Yes! This is one of the system's core features. You can set specific instructions for each star rating (1-5). For example, for a 1-star review you can configure a more empathetic response with a solution offer, while a 5-star review gets a more grateful response.

5.question: What happens if the system creates an inappropriate response?
5.answer: If you've enabled manual approval mode, you can reject or edit the response before publishing. In auto-publish mode, you can always delete or edit the response even after publication. Additionally, the system learns from your edits and improves over time.

6.question: Is the system secure? What about data privacy?
6.answer: The system uses official Google Business Profile API integration with OAuth 2.0, so we never store your Google password. All information is encrypted and securely stored in Supabase (PostgreSQL). We comply with the highest standards of data security and privacy.

7.question: Can I try the system before paying?
7.answer: Yes! We have a free plan that allows you to manage one business and up to 5 reviews per month without needing a credit card. You can upgrade to a paid plan anytime.

overview.pendingBanner: You have {count, plural, one {# review} other {# reviews}} awaiting response

name.label: Business Name
name.tooltip: The business name as it will appear in customer responses. Leave empty to use the name from Google Business Profile
name.helper: The business name as you want it to appear in responses

description.label: Business Description
description.tooltip: Detailed description of the business, services you provide, and unique features. This information will help AI create more tailored and accurate responses
description.placeholder: Describe your business, the services you provide, what makes you unique from competitors...
description.helper: This description will help AI create more tailored responses

phone.label: Contact Phone
phone.tooltip: Phone number to appear in responses to negative reviews (1-2 stars) to allow customers to reach out directly and resolve issues
phone.helper: Phone number to appear in negative reviews (1-2 stars)

toneOfVoice.label: Response Style
toneOfVoice.tooltip: Choose the writing style for automatic responses: professional for serious businesses, friendly for casual businesses, formal for upscale venues, or humorous for businesses with a lighthearted atmosphere

languageMode.label: Response Language
languageMode.tooltip: Choose auto-detect to have the system identify the review language and respond in the same language, or select a fixed language for all responses

emojis.label: Allowed Emojis
emojis.tooltip: Define which emojis the system is allowed to use in responses. Separate with spaces. Leave empty if you don't want to use emojis at all
emojis.placeholder: ‚ú® üôè ‚ù§Ô∏è (or leave empty to not use emojis)
emojis.helper: Only valid emojis will be saved. All other characters will be removed automatically

maxSentences.label: Maximum Sentences
maxSentences.tooltip: Set the response length. One sentence for short responses, two sentences (recommended) for balance between brevity and content, three sentences for more detailed responses

signature.label: Signature
signature.tooltip: Text that will appear at the end of every automatic response, for example 'David's Restaurant Team' or 'Best regards, Moti'
signature.helper: The signature that will appear at the end of every response

autoReply.label: Auto Reply
autoReply.tooltip: When enabled, the system will create and send an automatic response to reviews with this rating. Can be disabled for ratings you prefer to handle manually

customInstructions.label: Custom Instructions
customInstructions.tooltip: Add specific instructions to guide the AI on how to formulate responses for reviews with this rating. For example, for 1-2 stars you can request an apology and invitation to get in touch
customInstructions.placeholder: Add specific instructions for this rating...

helpers.low: Recommended to include an apology and phone number to arrange a personal call with the customer
helpers.medium: Recommended to express appreciation for the feedback and show willingness to improve
helpers.high: Recommended to express warm gratitude and encourage a return visit

general.title: 1. General
general.content: The following terms of service govern your use of the AI Responses service. Use of the service constitutes full agreement to these terms. Please read the terms carefully before using the service.

service.title: 2. The Service
service.content: The service provides an AI solution for managing and automatically responding to customer reviews on the Google Business Profile platform. The service includes creating personalized responses, managing businesses, and automatic publishing options.

permittedUse.title: 3. Permitted Use
permittedUse.content: You agree to use the service only for legal purposes and in accordance with these terms. You may not use the service in a way that could harm the service or interfere with other users' use.

userAccount.title: 4. User Account
userAccount.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account details and all activities conducted under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

paymentRefunds.title: 5. Payment and Refunds
paymentRefunds.content: Payment for the service is made according to the selected plan. Prices are subject to change with prior notice. Refund policy will be detailed separately.

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All intellectual property rights in the service and its content belong to us or our licensors. You may not copy, modify, or distribute the content without express written permission.

limitationLiability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
limitationLiability.content: The service is provided "as is" without warranty of any kind. We are not liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use or inability to use the service.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to change these terms of service at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon posting on the site. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes agreement to the updated terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact
contact.content: For questions or clarifications regarding the terms of service, please contact:

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use the AI Responses service. We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining the security of your information.

informationCollected.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollected.content: We collect several types of information:
items: Personal information: Name, email address, phone number
Business information: Business details, Google Business Profile
Technical information: IP address, browser type, operating system

useOfInformation.title: 3. Use of Information
useOfInformation.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:

informationSecurity.title: 4. Information Security
informationSecurity.content: We use advanced security measures to protect your information, including data encryption, OAuth 2.0 authentication with Google, and secure storage in Supabase. However, no method of transmission or storage is 100% secure.

sharingWithThirdParties.title: 5. Sharing Information with Third Parties
sharingWithThirdParties.content: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except:

userRights.title: 6. User Rights
userRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze site traffic, and for security purposes. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information as long as your account is active or as needed for service purposes. After account deletion, information will be deleted in accordance with our retention policy and legal requirements.

policyChanges.title: 9. Policy Changes
policyChanges.content: We may update our privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of significant changes through the site or via email. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes agreement to the updated policy.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: For questions or requests regarding the privacy policy or exercising your rights, please contact:
